string.value: Now that you have an idea of what an informant does, it's time to get your hands dirty. #b#p1002104##k will tell you what to do.

Your first information gathering assignment is to find out why the #o1210102#s near #m100000000# have started acting so wildly. They're usually so tame! #p1002104# tells you to ask the mushroom monster scholar about the occurrence and see if he can shed some light on what's been going on. #b#p1012111##k can be found in #b#m100000000##k.
Now that you have an idea of what an informant does, shall we begin the real mission? Let's start it off somewhere easy…which means…yes, #b#m100000000##k.
Are you familiar with #m100000000#? It's a bowman town located east of #m104000000#. It's also the heart of Victoria Island. The town is famous for its mushrooms.

But lately, the #o1210102#s near #m100000000# have been causing trouble. If you find out the reason behind this mess, the information should prove to quite lucrative. Head over to #m100000000# and ask around to gather information on #bthe abnormal behavior of these mushroom monsters#k.
Luckily there's a mushroom scholar named #b#p1012111##k at #m100000000# who specializes in studying mushroom monsters. Maybe a word with him will get you some valuable information. Good luck!
Oh, and although its possible to reach #m100000000# on foot, you're still at a low level. I suggest you use a cab. Use the Taxi Coupon I just gave you, and it'll take you directly to #m100000000#.

You know how to ride a cab, right? Leave this place, head to your left, and you'll find a #bLith Harbor Regular Cab#k. Use the Taxi Coupon I gave you, talk to the cab driver, and the cab'll take you straight to #m100000000#.
Hmmm… are you too nervous to venture into other towns? No worries! Just like #m104000000#, #m100000000# is a town catered toward beginners. No high-level monsters there at all.
How can I help you? You want to know more about the mushroom monsters? Hmmm? The #o1210102#s surrounding #m100000000# are acting strange?
Haven't you gone to #m100000000# yet? Use the #bTaxi Coupon#k I just gave you and take the cab located on the west side of #m104000000#. You'll get there before you know it.
